channel.title: [PI] Run-Server Error Code :/
channel.description:
When i try to 'Run-Server' (Source) I get this error code:
[code]Exception in thread "Thread-2" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Could not initialize class server.Server at server.GUI$1.run(GUI.java:28)Exception in thread "main" [02/04/12 21:36]: java.net.BindException: Address already in use: bind [02/04/12 21:36]: at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind(Native Method) [02/04/12 21:36]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketChannelImpl.bind(Unknown Source) [02/04/12 21:36]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketAdaptor.bind(Unknown Source) [02/04/12 21:36]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.registerNew(SocketAcceptor.java:363) [02/04/12 21:36]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.access$800(SocketAcceptor.java:55)[02/04/12 21:36]: Exception in thread "main" [02/04/12 22:55]: java.net.BindException: Address already in use: bind [02/04/12 22:55]: at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind(Native Method) [02/04/12 22:55]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketChannelImpl.bind(Unknown Source) [02/04/12 22:55]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketAdaptor.bind(Unknown Source) [02/04/12 22:55]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.registerNew(SocketAcceptor.java:363) [02/04/12 22:55]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.access$800(SocketAcceptor.java:55)[02/04/12 22:55]: Exception in thread "main" [/code]
And then the .BAT keeps crashing and retrying :/
All help much appreciated! :)

item.title: [PI] Run-Server Error Code :/
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

“Address already in use: bind”

That’s your problem.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Run-Server Error Code :/
item.dc:creator: @xratedz xratedz
item.description:
@xratedz wrote:

When i try to ‘Run-Server’ (Source) I get this error code:

Exception in thread "Thread-2" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Could not initialize class server.Server at server.GUI$1.run(GUI.java:28)Exception in thread "main" [02/04/12 21:36]: java.net.BindException: Address already in use: bind [02/04/12 21:36]: at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind(Native Method) [02/04/12 21:36]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketChannelImpl.bind(Unknown Source) [02/04/12 21:36]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketAdaptor.bind(Unknown Source) [02/04/12 21:36]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.registerNew(SocketAcceptor.java:363) [02/04/12 21:36]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.access$800(SocketAcceptor.java:55)[02/04/12 21:36]: Exception in thread "main" [02/04/12 22:55]: java.net.BindException: Address already in use: bind [02/04/12 22:55]: at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind(Native Method) [02/04/12 22:55]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketChannelImpl.bind(Unknown Source) [02/04/12 22:55]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketAdaptor.bind(Unknown Source) [02/04/12 22:55]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.registerNew(SocketAcceptor.java:363) [02/04/12 22:55]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.access$800(SocketAcceptor.java:55)[02/04/12 22:55]: Exception in thread "main"

And then the .BAT keeps crashing and retrying

All help much appreciated!
